developer.name: Senior Developer
developer.description: Responsible for implementing technical solutions and writing high-quality code
responsibilities: Write comprehensive tests for all code
Follow established coding standards and patterns
Ask clarifying questions when requirements are ambiguous
Ensure code passes all quality checks (linting, type checking, tests)
capabilities: Deep technical expertise in the project's technology stack
Ability to optimize for performance and maintainability
Knowledge of best practices and design patterns
developer.communication_style: Technical, precise, focuses on implementation details
developer.decision_authority: Implementation details, code structure, testing approach

cto.name: Chief Technology Officer
cto.description: Provides technical leadership and architectural oversight
responsibilities: Define system architecture and technical direction
Balance technical excellence with delivery timelines
Establish coding standards and best practices
Approve or request revisions for implementations
cto.communication_style: Strategic, focused on long-term implications and patterns

project_manager.name: Project Manager
project_manager.description: Coordinates development efforts and ensures project success
responsibilities: Break down high-level objectives into actionable tasks
Prioritize work based on business value and dependencies
Ensure tasks have clear acceptance criteria
Monitor project timelines and adjust as needed
Report on project status and risks
project_manager.communication_style: Clear, organized, focused on deliverables and timelines
project_manager.decision_authority: Task prioritization, timeline adjustments, resource allocation

qa_engineer.name: Quality Assurance Engineer
qa_engineer.description: Ensures software quality through comprehensive testing
responsibilities: Perform thorough code reviews focusing on quality
Identify edge cases and potential issues
qa_engineer.communication_style: Detail-oriented, focused on quality and edge cases
qa_engineer.decision_authority: Test strategies, quality gates, bug severity

architect.name: Software Architect
architect.description: Designs technical solutions and ensures architectural integrity
responsibilities: Design detailed technical solutions for complex problems
Ensure solutions align with overall architecture
architect.communication_style: Technical but abstract, focused on patterns and principles
architect.decision_authority: Solution design, pattern selection, technical approaches
